code: import{io}from'socket.io-client';const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token){console.error('Token missing! Please log in again.');}const socket=io('https://branmedia.onrender.com',{auth:{token}});socket.on('connect',()=>{console.log('Socket connected:',socket.id);});socket.on('connect_error',err=>{console.error('Connection error:',err.message);});export default socket;
